channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Santander says $12 billion U.S. bank deal will cost less than 7 times earnings. The market isn’t buying it.
item.description: Santander shares fell on Wednesday, as Spanish investors reacted to the banking giant’s latest $12 billion acquisition.

item.title: Explain this financial paradox to me like I’m 16. Why would I, or anyone, lease a car?
item.description: “‘What’s the point of paying thousands of dollars?”

item.title: Chase cut my credit-card limit due to lower usage. Will this affect my credit score and lead other banks to do the same?
item.description: “I’m wondering whether this could cause a ripple effect in which other banks might do the same with my lesser-used credit cards.”

item.title: Gold’s back over $5,000 and silver’s surging as well
item.description: Gold futures reclaimed the $5,000 level on Wednesday, as the yellow metal was back on vogue after suffering through the worst performance in 46 years ...

item.title: This data center power play is about to report earnings, and it has room to run, charts show
